en:
春光明媚
(Chūnguāng míngmèi)

Glorious Spring

Translations of 春光明媚
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

春光 明媚
    Glorious Spring, Beautiful spring, Spring sunshine, The spring sunshine, Lovely spring
ja:

(Eikō no haru)
